IX.i.3.D.2.a
.
Using VA Form 21P-8416 When Development Is Needed
If development for medical expenses is needed, send the beneficiary
VA
Form 21P-8416, Medical Expense Report
.
Notes
:
In a Parents’ DIC or Section 306 Pension case, always develop for medical expenses using the calendar year period (January 1 through December 31).
In a current-law pension case, the development period may be the 12-month initial year period
or
the calendar year period, depending on which period medical expenses applies.
References
:  For more information on
determining the reporting period, see
M21-1, Part IX, Subpart i, 3.A.3
, and
written requests for evidence, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.D.1.a
.
